ob_05_elinor_001.content: Hi friends! Let's play Hide and Seek together!

ob_05_elinor_002.content: Pick who is player one and who is player two.

ob_05_elinor_003_tap.content: Player 1, when you are ready, tap here.

ob_05_elinor_003_click.content: Player 1, when you are ready, click here.

ob_05_elinor_005_tap.content: Tap the green check mark when you are done.

ob_05_elinor_005_click.content: Click the green check mark when you are done.

ob_05_elinor_007.content: when you’re ready, tap the button here.

ob_05_elinor_008_tap.content: Tap the green check mark when you are done.

ob_05_elinor_008_click.content: Click the green check mark when you are done.

ob_05_elinor_013.content: Player 2, close your eyes like me!

ob_05_elinor_015.content: Okay Player 1, get ready to hide

ob_05_elinor_016.content: To hide someone, move them from here.

ob_05_elinor_017_tap.content: Tap the green check mark when you are done.

ob_05_elinor_017_click.content: Click the green check mark when you are done.

ob_05_elinor_019.content: Player 2, are you ready to seek with me?

ob_05_elinor_020_tap.content: Tap your button when you’re ready.

ob_05_elinor_020_click.content: Click your button when you’re ready.

ob_05_elinor_023.content: Okay player 2, now it’s your turn to hide.

ob_05_elinor_023_alt.content: Okay player 1, now it’s your turn to hide.

ob_05_elinor_025.content: Player 1, close your eyes like me!

ob_05_elinor_026.content: Okay Player 2, get ready to hide us.

ob_05_elinor_028.content: Player 1, are you ready to seek?

ob_05_elinor_030_tap.content: Tap your button when you’re ready.

ob_05_elinor_030_click.content: Click your button when you’re ready.

ob_05_elinor_031.content: Ready or not, here I come!

ob_05_elinor_033.content: Ready or not, here we come!

ob_05_elinor_034.content: Match their color to the hiding place,

ob_05_elinor_035.content: There are lots of places to hide.

ob_05_elinor_036.content: These circles show you who you need to hide.

ob_05_elinor_037.content: You can move them from here to a hiding spot.

ob_05_elinor_038.content: There are more places to hide over there.
